about_the_game:
Gravemyst is a retro dungeon crawler that plunges players into a hauntingly destitute world. Go alone, or online with a group of friends, to discover the ever-changing mysts shrouded in mystery, ancient lore, powerful artifacts, and countless secrets. Players will explore the forsaken dungeons of Gravemyst, uncovering the hidden truths buried beneath its cursed soil and battling the horrors that lurk in the shadows. No hero has the same story, as the mysts are constantly changing the dungeons and lairs below. Adventurers will have to adapt with each delve to truly reach the riches they desire.

  • Classes and Talent Trees: Choose from multiple classes, each with unique talent trees allowing for diverse playstyles and strategies.
  • Weapons, Armor, and Spells: Equip a variety of weapons, armor, and spells to customize your character and enhance your combat abilities.
  • Dungeon Modifiers: Morph your dungeon experience by adding modifiers that increase the challenge and rewards.
  • Variety of Monsters and Environments: Encounter a wide array of monsters and explore diverse environments, each with its own unique challenges.
  • Procedurally Generated Dungeons: All dungeon layouts are procedurally generated, ensuring that each playthrough is widely different and offers a fresh experience.
  • Roguelite Progression: Gain progression with each run you complete, allowing you to unlock new abilities, gear, and enhancements to aid you in future journeys.


You will be in charge of a newly founded Artifact Collecting company, looking to capitalize on the vast riches below. The heavily guarded ruins of Gravemyst contain ever changing dungeons, caves, temples, and more. Your company will recruit mercenaries and explorers to delve into the myst. You will control these adventurers in a FPS RPG like experience. With many options to customize each recruit and continue to develop them as you advance through the depths. Although, most of the time the myst consumes them before they can return. Only the best of heroes can travel through Gravemyst and return alive. You will have opportunities along the way to offload your loot, and build your reputation around the ruins. This will help advance your company to provide better chances to survive the onslaught that lies underneath and reach the most sought Artifacts.
